sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: The DocBook XSL Stylesheets package contains XSL stylesheets. These are useful for performing transformations on XML DocBook files.

sect2.title: Installation
sect2.para: Install DocBook XSL Stylesheets by running the following commands as the root user:

screen.userinput: install -v -m755 -d /usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version; && cp -v -R VERSION common eclipse epub extensions fo highlighting html htmlhelp \ images javahelp lib manpages params profiling roundtrip slides \ template tests tools webhelp website xhtml xhtml-1_1 \ /usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version; && ln -v -s VERSION /usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version;/VERSION.xsl

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: Create (or append) and populate the XML catalog file using the following commands as the root user:

screen.userinput: if [ ! -d /etc/xml ]; then install -v -m755 -d /etc/xml; fi && if [ ! -f /etc/xml/catalog ]; then xmlcatalog --noout --create /etc/xml/catalog fi && xmlcatalog --noout --add "rewriteSystem" \ "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/&docbook-xsl-version;" \ "/usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version;" \ /etc/xml/catalog && xmlcatalog --noout --add "rewriteURI" \ "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/&docbook-xsl-version;" \ "/usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version;" \ /etc/xml/catalog && xmlcatalog --noout --add "rewriteSystem" \ "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current" \ "/usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version;" \ /etc/xml/catalog && xmlcatalog --noout --add "rewriteURI" \ "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current" \ "/usr/share/xml/docbook/xsl-stylesheets-&docbook-xsl-version;" \ /etc/xml/catalog

sect2.para: Occasionally, you may find the need to install other versions of the XSL stylesheets as some projects reference a specific version. One example is BLFS-6.0, which required the 1.67.2 version.
